"Recon. Especial: Urbano":
"The Darker influence over a local ARKS
ship is growing at an alarming rate.
As a result, the local fauna have become
overwhelmingly powerful. We've created
a quarantine area; only ARKS who possess
Advanced Capsules are permitted inside.
As a secret advanced squad, you must
enter the area and suppress the natives!
――――――――――――――――――――
Fracaso: Ser Derrotado por el Jefe / Si acaba el tiempo"

"Debes pagar 1 Advance Capsule a
en el Campship."

"Debes pagar 10 Advance Capsule d
en el Campship."
